name: Challenge Dream Cat
description:
Charming treats that cats can't forget once they eat...
Just run to feed your cat a tasty treat

- How to play
Control the cute cat to move forward.
Break through the Various traps and terrain to get a treat.
They can annoy you very much,
but you can also see the cute look of your cat.
Once you get the treat, your cat will enjoy it very much.

- Characteristic
  • Cute Cat
  • Various traps and terrain
  • Save Points
  • Larger and more beautiful map than expected
  • Comic sound and background music
  • Humorous challenges
  • Approximate game length: 2 to 3 hours

This game is a 3D casual run game that anyone can enjoy.
